Hero.subtitle: The next generation darts competition platform. Match search, club creation, real-time results and full customization.

hero.subtitle: A complete guide from registration to the start of the competition. Everything you need to know to use tDarts.

grid.title: Choose a topic
grid.no_results_desc: Try using a different search term

Features.title: Why tDarts?
Features.description: The most modern darts competition platform with all the features you can imagine. Simple, fast, professional.

search.title: Competition Search
search.description: Easily find a competition based on location, level and time. Filter the results and apply with one click.

draw.title: Competition Notice
draw.description: Create your own tournaments with unique rules and formats. Automatic group assignment and pairing.

club.title: Club Management
club.description: Start or join darts clubs, organize community events. Full membership management.

stats.title: Statistical Tracking
stats.description: Detailed statistics for each player: averages, 180s, highest exits, form graph.

realtime.title: Real Time Tracking
realtime.description: Follow live matches and results. Automatic update and notifications.

custom.title: Full Customization
custom.description: All tournament formats supported: 501, 301, Cricket and custom rules. Customizable boards.

qr.title: QR Code Connection
qr.description: Players can join with a QR code and password, without registration. It's quick and easy.

tablet.title: Tablet Support
tablet.description: It supports tablets displayed for boards. Optimized writing surface and touch control.

secure.title: Password Protected
secure.description: Each tournament is protected with its own password. Secure access and data protection.

cta.title: Are you ready to go?
cta.description: Learn how the system works and create your first tournament in minutes.

Pricing.title: Choose the Perfect Package
Pricing.description: Pricing suitable for clubs and tournament organizers of all sizes
Pricing.test_note: * The site is currently in test mode. The subscription model will be available soon.

basic.name: Basis
basic.description: A perfect choice for testing the system

Footer.oac_info: Find out more about the National Amateur League!
Footer.partners_note: Our prominent partners who support the development of Hungarian darts.

waiting_list.subscribe_card_title: Sign up for the waiting list
waiting_list.subscribe_card_desc_free: You can apply directly to the tournament, but if you want, you can also sign up for the waiting list. If the tournament is full, we will automatically notify you when a free place becomes available.
waiting_list.subscribe_card_desc_full: The tournament is full. You can sign up for the waiting list and we will automatically notify you when a space becomes available.
waiting_list.no_one: There is no one on the waiting list yet.

notifications.unsubscribe_success: You have successfully unsubscribed from notifications!
notifications.subscribe_prompt: Sign up for notifications of vacancies!

dialog.error_tie: A draw is not possible in the knockout stage.

knockout.error_bye_legs: There are no tickets for bye matches.
knockout.error_select_board: Please select a board when adding players.
knockout.error_select_player: Please select at least one player!
knockout.error_loading_title: An error occurred while loading the knockout table
knockout.error_reload_prompt: Try reloading the page or generate a new round in the admin interface.

status_changer.title: Gym status actions
status_changer.description: With the options below, you can generate groups and direct elimination, or close the tournament.
status_changer.alert_player_count_desc: A minimum of {min} and a maximum of {max} players are required per group.
status_changer.alert_player_count_current: There are currently {available} logged-in players available for {boards} board (total of {total} players).

groups_dialog.title: Generating groups
groups_dialog.description: Choose whether we will automatically generate the groups or if you want to assign the players manually.
groups_dialog.alert_check_desc: In the case of {boards} board, the number of registered players must be between {min} and {max} players. There are currently {available} players available.

manual_groups_dialog.title: Manual group builder
manual_groups_dialog.description: Choose which players to appear on each board. A minimum of 3 and a maximum of 6 players are allowed per board.
manual_groups_dialog.boards_desc: Boards that have already been closed cannot be selected. The marking shows the number of selected players.
manual_groups_dialog.no_players_selected: You have not selected any players yet.
manual_groups_dialog.select_board_first: First select a table from the list on the left.
manual_groups_dialog.error_no_valid_groups: At least one valid group must be selected (3-6 players per board).
manual_groups_dialog.error_load: Failed to load manual group editor.

knockout_dialog.title: Generating a straight drop
knockout_dialog.description: Choose whether we automatically generate the pairings or you want to assign the players manually.
knockout_dialog.alert_unsupported_desc: Automatic generation is only possible for 2, 4, 8 or 16 groups (MDL rules). Switch to manual mode.
knockout_dialog.qualifiers_desc: Choose how many players will advance per group. This determines the size of the main board.
knockout_dialog.bracket_size: Expected main board size: {size} people (for {boards} group)
knockout_dialog.note_desc: The straight line is generated automatically based on the rules of the MDL straight line. If you want a different approach, choose Manual mode and record matches manually.
knockout_dialog.alert_manual_desc: We create empty circles that you can later fill in with players as you wish. This mode is recommended if you want to place featured players.

cancel_knockout_dialog.title: Undo Knockout
cancel_knockout_dialog.description: This action will delete all knockout rounds and matches. Are you sure you want to continue? This step cannot be undone.
cancel_knockout_dialog.error: It was not possible to undo the outright elimination.

third_place_dialog.title: 3. choosing a place
third_place_dialog.description: Before the end of the tournament, you can choose who will be in 3rd place. If you do not select anyone, both players eliminated in the semi-finals will receive 4th place.

share_modal.title: Share a workout
share_modal.description: Share the tournament link or QR code with the players.
share_modal.type_public_desc: Public link - anyone can watch the tournament.
share_modal.type_auth_desc: Login link - automatic redirection after login.
